text: Richard Ian Faulkner (born 1 January 1980) is an English musician best known as one of the lead guitarists for the heavy metal band Judas Priest since 2011, replacing original member K. K. Downing. Faulkner has also performed with Lauren Harris, Christopher Lee, Voodoo Six, Deeds, and Ace Mafia. ==References== Category:Heavy metal guitarists Category:1980 births Category:English guitarists Category:Musicians from London
title: Richie Faulkner
